description: Creates a new domain association for an Amplify app. This action associates a custom domain with the Amplify app.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID for an Amplify app.

parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The domain name for the domain association.

parameters.name: subDomainSettings
parameters.description: The setting for the subdomain. (dict) --- Describes the settings for the subdomain. The prefix setting for the subdomain. The branch name setting for the subdomain.

nested_params.name: prefix
nested_params.description: The prefix setting for the subdomain.

nested_params.name: branchName
nested_params.description: The branch name setting for the subdomain.

parameters.name: autoSubDomainCreationPatterns
parameters.description: Sets the branch patterns for automatic subdomain creation. (string) ---

parameters.name: certificateSettings
parameters.description: The type of SSL/TLS certificate to use for your custom domain. If you don't specify a certificate type, Amplify uses the default certificate that it provisions and manages for you. The certificate type. Specify AMPLIFY_MANAGED to use the default certificate that Amplify provisions for you. Specify CUSTOM to use your own certificate that you have already added to Certificate Manager in your Amazon Web Services account. Make sure you request (or import) the certificate in the US East (N. Virginia) Region (us-east-1). For more information about using ACM, see Importing certificates into Certificate Manager in the ACM User guide. customCertificateArn (string) --- The Amazon resource name (ARN) for the custom certificate that you have already added to Certificate Manager in your Amazon Web Services account. This field is required only when the certificate type is CUSTOM.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The certificate type. Specify AMPLIFY_MANAGED to use the default certificate that Amplify provisions for you. Specify CUSTOM to use your own certificate that you have already added to Certificate Manager in your Amazon Web Services account. Make sure you request (or import) the certificate in the US East (N. Virginia) Region (us-east-1). For more information about using ACM, see Importing certificates into Certificate Manager in the ACM User guide.

nested_params.name: customCertificateArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) for the custom certificate that you have already added to Certificate Manager in your Amazon Web Services account. This field is required only when the certificate type is CUSTOM.

nested_items.name: domainAssociation
nested_items.description: Describes the structure of a domain association, which associates a custom domain with an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: domainAssociationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the domain association.

nested_items.name: domainName
nested_items.description: The name of the domain.

nested_items.name: enableAutoSubDomain
nested_items.description: Enables the automated creation of subdomains for branches.

nested_items.name: autoSubDomainCreationPatterns
nested_items.description: Sets branch patterns for automatic subdomain creation.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: autoSubDomainIAMRole
nested_items.description: The required AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) service role for the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for automatically creating subdomains.

nested_items.name: domainStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the domain association.

nested_items.name: updateStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the domain update operation that is currently in progress. The following list describes the valid update states.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: Additional information that describes why the domain association is in the current state.

nested_items.name: certificateVerificationDNSRecord
nested_items.description: The DNS record for certificate verification.

nested_items.name: subDomains
nested_items.description: The subdomains for the domain association.

nested_items.name: subDomainSetting
nested_items.description: Describes the settings for the subdomain.

nested_items.name: prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix setting for the subdomain.

nested_items.name: branchName
nested_items.description: The branch name setting for the subdomain.

nested_items.name: verified
nested_items.description: The verified status of the subdomain.

nested_items.name: dnsRecord
nested_items.description: The DNS record for the subdomain.

nested_items.name: certificate
nested_items.description: Describes the SSL/TLS certificate for the domain association. This can be your own custom certificate or the default certificate that Amplify provisions for you.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of SSL/TLS certificate that you want to use.

nested_items.name: customCertificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) for a custom certificate that you have already added to Certificate Manager in your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: certificateVerificationDNSRecord
nested_items.description: The DNS record for certificate verification.
